Hmm.  Tevildo has fifty on his website.  You definitely need to send 
your team through his scenarios before going through the ones I have 
finished [mine are harder].  the link for mine is 
http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/scenarios.zip .  It's nice to have 
another Daniel in this egroup. 
:-)
